meanings: retirement (from active life), 은거하다 live[dwell] in retirement, go into retirement
retire to hermitage in the mountain

examples.korean: He secluded himself in a mountain hermitage. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 산중의 암자에 은거했다 Neungyule
examples.english: He secluded himself in a mountain hermitage. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: So he retreated to a cave in the surrounding mountains for meditation and reflection. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그래서 그는 명상과 반성을 하기 위해 주변의 산에 있는 동굴에 은거했다. Neungyule
examples.english: So he retreated to a cave in the surrounding mountains for meditation and reflection. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Part of people in the academy went to grass while a dictator ruled. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 독재자가 군림하는 동안 학계의 일부는 은거하였다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Part of people in the academy went to grass while a dictator ruled. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He broke upon my seclusion. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 나의 은거를 불시에 방문했다. 영어영작문대사전
examples.english: He broke upon my seclusion. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: retire from the world into a monastery 듣기 Add to Wordbook 세상을 버리고 수도원에 은거하다. 영어영작문대사전
